We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR Officer

Job Location: Rivers
Job type: Full-time

Job Purpose


	The HR Officer is responsible for timely and accurate support in Recruitment, onboarding and other HR functions.

	Coordinate recruitment and selection process and invite potential candidate(s) for Interview and ensure smooth onboarding process for new hires

	Develop and deliver employee training programs to enhance skills and knowledge

	Manage all Hotel Accommodation and reservations for staff and partners/Clients (where applicable)

	Coordinate Meetings/refreshments at the Office when necessary and ensure staff welfare at all times. 
	Facilitate internal communications like memos, correspondences,   presentations etc as needed
	Ensure proper staff attendance at the Office.
	Raise Internal Requests as applicable.
	Perform Administrative Support Activities.
	Send the Weekly Report to your Supervisor.
	Carryout any other responsibility that may be assigned to you from time to time by your supervisor


Qualifications


	B.Sc. / BA in Business Administration or Human Resources from a reputable institution or any other or related field
	Minimum of 5 years of working experience.
	MBA/MSC is an added advantage.
	CIPM membership is an added advantage
	Proven experience in HR or a relevant role.
	Understanding of business functions such as HR, Finance, Communications, Operations,
	Strategies, Marketing etc.
	Knowledge of labour laws and regulations.
	Excellent communication skills

title: Job Openings at Nemitt Pharmaceuticals Limited
content:
The company Nemitt Pharmaceuticals Limited is an indigenous pharmaceutical company incorporated in July 1988 as a fully capitalized limited liability company with RC no 116 088 to among other activities, engage in the wholesale of Pharmaceutical products. Nemitt Pharmaceuticals Limited was born out of the dire need for an alternative to the hitherto existing chaotic distribution in the pharmaceutical supply chain. with the goal of addressing the gaps in the distribution value chain.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Store Assistant

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Replenish supply inventories following established guidelines of the company
	Maintain a neat, clean, and safe working environment as per government regulations
	Manage the store layout
	Receive, load up, and shelf supplies
	Perform stock-related duties like returning, packing, and labelling
	Inspect deliveries for discrepancies or damage
	Report damaged or short-dated inventories for record-keeping and management
	Rotate,dispose of surplus stock, and expired quantities
	Keep an organised allocation of inventory placed in the warehouse and store
	Ensure proper completion of documentation of inbound and outbound orders


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a minimum of an OND or an HND
	Prior experience in pharmaceuticals,retail, and warehousingwould be advantageous.
	Organized and punctual.
	Good verbal and written communication skills.
	Physical stamina and the ability to lift and move cartons
	Proficient in Microsoft Office.
	Proximity to Ojuelegba, Apapa, Onipan, Yaba, Ebute Metta, Anthony, and environs is very important ( Only candidates who live close to Ojuelegba would be considered)
	Men are encouraged to apply for gender balance.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 / month

Application Closing Date: 9th December, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrnemitt@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Personal Driver (with Vehicle)

Job Location: Festac - Isolo Axis, Lagos
Employment Type: Contract
Schedule: Monday to Friday

Job Summary


	We are looking for a reliable driver with a personal vehicle to provide daily transportation for a client between Festac and Isolo.
	The driver will ensure timely pick-up and drop-off, and ensure safe, smooth commuting at all times.


Responsibilities


	Pick up the client from Festac at 7:00 AM and drop off at the Ajao Estate office location.
	Pick up the client from Isolo by 5:30 PM and drop off at Festac residence.
	Maintain punctuality and reliability in daily schedules.
	Keep vehicle clean, well-maintained, and roadworthy.
	Follow traffic laws and ensure the client’s safety throughout the journey.


Time:


	Morning Pick-up: 7:00 AM (Festac to Isolo)
	Evening Drop-off: 5:30 PM (Isolo to Festac)


Requirements


	Must own a reliable, clean vehicle in good working condition.
	Must live within or around Festac, Isolo, Amuwo Odofin, or nearby areas.
	Valid driver’s license and necessary vehicle documents.
	Good knowledge of Lagos routes and traffic flow.
	Responsible, polite, and safety-conscious.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 2nd December, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: plugzoneonlinecv@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For inquiries, WhatsApp: 08114674033 (Text only).

 

3.) Warehouse Assistant

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a dedicated and organized Warehouse/ Store official to join our team.
	You will be responsible for managing inventory, overseeing stock levels, and ensuring the smooth operation of our store.
	The ideal candidate will have excellent organizational and problem-solving skills, attention to detail, satmina, and the ability to work independently in a fast-paced environment.


Job Description


	Replenish supply inventories following the established guidelines of the company
	Maintain a neat, clean, and safe working environment as per regulations
	Manage the store layout
	Receive, upload, and shelf supplies
	Perform stock-related duties like returning, packing, and labelling
	Inspect deliveries for discrepancies or damage
	Report damaged or short-dated inventories for record-keeping and reimbursement
	Rotate stock and dispose of surplus and expired quantities
	Keep an organised allocation of inventory placed in the warehouse and store
	Ensure proper completion of documentation of inbound and outbound orders.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a minimum of ND, HND with 0 - 1 years of work experience.
	Must be organized and punctual.
	Prior experience in retail would be advantageous.
	Good verbal and written communication skills.
	Physical stamina and the ability to lift and move cartons
	Proficient in Microsoft Office.
	Proximity to Ojuelegba is very important ( Yaba, Surulere, Maryland, Onipan, Apapa, Ebute-metta, Anthony, etc).


Salary
N100,000 - N140,000 monthly. 

Application Closing Date: 1st December, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrnemitt@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
